ingredients.ingredient: 2 tablespoons unsalted butter, at room temperature
3 large russet potatoes, or more to taste
kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste
¾ cup grated sharp white Cheddar cheese

cookingTips: Slice potatoes uniformly thin for even cooking
Use whole milk for a richer, creamier gratin
Sharp Cheddar adds depth of flavor compared to mild cheese
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user create a luxurious potato gratin with proper layering and creamy sauce.
